building.title: Brand New and Modern Building
building.paragraph: The entire building is brand new with a modern style both outside and inside the rooms.

room.title: Comfortable Rooms with Air Conditioning
room.paragraph: All our rooms are equipped with quality air conditioning to provide you with pleasant stays in both winter and summer.

terrace.title: Terrace with a Magnificent View
terrace.paragraph: A terrace with a breathtaking view to allow you to admire the sunset and end the day beautifully.

internet.title: High-Speed Internet Connection (Optical Fiber)
internet.paragraph: A high-speed internet connection is available to you with optical fiber to keep you connected at all times.

shower.title: Shower with Hot Water Available 24/7
shower.paragraph: Equipped with showers with hot water, all our rooms meet the criteria to offer you relaxing stays.

location.title: City Center Location (Easy Access)
location.paragraph: Located in the city center, access is easy, and you will be just meters away from shopping malls for shopping.

info.title: Car Rental
info.paragraph: Valiha hotel has its own vehicle fleet and also collaborates with subcontractors selected by us with very strict criteria. You provide us with your dates and the desired itinerary, and we will confirm feasibility based on the period and road conditions. Travel times are generally quite long, so it's essential to consider travel time rather than just kilometers.
